overview: A persons position shapes their perspective. Thaddeus has all but accepted his place on the food chain as a Beta Male, until one day he stumbles upon Amor Fati. A Love Potion that renders him irresistible. His social and sexual conquests negatively infect his personality to the point he loses the one who truly cares about him. Join the sexy, humorous, wild ride of Love of Fate part 1. Amor Fati!
title: Love Of Fate: Amore Fati
